name: 3brtr4i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, c1, c2)
-| wbr(c0, c1, c4)
-| wceq(c2, c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, c1, c2)
-| wbr(c0, c1, c4)
-| wceq(c2, c4)

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, c1, c4)
-| wceq(c0, c3)
-| wbr(c3, c1, c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, c1, c2)
-| wceq(c2, c4)
-| wceq(c0, c3)
-| wbr(c3, c1, c4)

comment: Substitution of equality into both sides of a binary relation. (Contributed by NM, 11-Aug-1999.)
